scenes.description: Takanashi Kiara and Moona Hoshinova perform the song 'FOCUS'.
Intermission between songs with a black screen and fireworks effects.
Takanashi Kiara and Ouro Kronii perform the song 'CH4NGE'.

subtitles.original: Do the best 起こせ 願わくば事故
subtitles.english: Do the best, make it happen, hopefully an accident

subtitles.original: 一世一代 さなぎ落とすジレンマ
subtitles.english: Once in a lifetime, the dilemma of shedding the cocoon

subtitles.original: 勝ち負けとか どうだっていいわ
subtitles.english: Winning or losing doesn't really matter

subtitles.original: 幕開けるわ
subtitles.english: The curtain is rising

subtitles.original: 確信して 勝ちを掴む どちら様 次第次第
subtitles.english: Be confident and seize the victory, depending on who you are

subtitles.original: 引けるか どっから自分 次第次第 なあ
subtitles.english: Can you pull back? From where, it depends on yourself, hey

subtitles.original: 余裕で振り切り 絶好調 絶好調 yeah yeah yeah yeah
subtitles.english: Easily shaking it off, in perfect condition, in perfect condition, yeah yeah yeah yeah

subtitles.original: そこ退け そこの X 攫うのは私だ
subtitles.english: Get out of the way, the one to snatch that X is me

subtitles.original: Say more かっさらえ Hey 頂点
subtitles.english: Say more, snatch it away, hey, the top

subtitles.original: Play boy get don't get in my way じゃあね 黙ってて
subtitles.english: Play boy, don't get in my way, see ya, stay quiet

subtitles.original: あっちこっち そっちどっち Enough enough 嫌
subtitles.english: Here and there, that way or this way, enough, enough, no

subtitles.original: 満ちなき道よ 闇闇闇
subtitles.english: A road without fullness, darkness, darkness, darkness

subtitles.original: 空回りそうで でもまだ止めないで
subtitles.english: Feeling like I'm spinning my wheels, but don't stop yet

subtitles.english: Outside that window, voices, voices, each getting their own way

subtitles.original: あんたここまで 後ろだけ見て嘆け
